1.content:
Having graduated a couple of months ago you and your girlfriend Philippa have spent a while in Australia on a holiday to celebrate your graduation.

Now you are both back and looking ahead to going back to University to do a top up degree. Both you and Philippa are really keen to go back.

Having been at University for two months you and Philippa are sat in the University restaurant and as you down a drink you feel dizzy, Philippa feels the same.

Within minutes you both fall off your chair and hit the floor and then shrink down towards the floor. Luckily you were in a concealed corner of the bar so nobody had seen you.

When you both wake up you are on the hard brown floor of the student restaurant. Infront of you are loads of tables with students sat round them eating their lunch.

You decide that you have to get help from someone, looking around you spot a pair of shoes that you recognise as they stand out. The red/silver shoes belong to:
1.title: Who do you get help from?

11.content:
amy rosebuck
was 21 year old girl
she had a ba in Equine Management
she had long black hair
what hapens
11.title: Amy Roebuck

info.brief_description: You and your girlfriend mysteriously shrink, find someone to help you quick!
info.description:
Your name is Tom, you are 21 and you are studying Golf Management at University. You have a beautiful girlfriend called Philippa who is 22 and you've been together for 2 and a half years. You've both graduated last year and you are now studying for a BA (Hons) Golf Management and Phillippa is studying Buisness & Information Technology HND.

You and Phillippa graduating:
http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/6697/tomphillippaej2.jpg

While on campus one summers day both of you mysteriously shrink and are in trouble. You must find someone to help you. You are found by one of the following:

> Amy Roebuck, 21 yrs old: BA (Hons) Equine Management
http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/2172/amyroebuckpk1.jpg

> Tracy Barker, 22 yrs old: BA (Hons) Equine Management
http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/2931/tracybarkerdt3.jpg

> Carla Williams, 20 yrs old: BSc Animal Behaviour Studies
http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/756/carlawilliamsyj9.jpg

> Sarah 'Choci' Clarke, 23 yrs old: BSc Vetinary Studies & Animal Management
http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/7797/sarahchociclarkeea7.jpg

> Clare Livesey, 22 yrs old: BA (Hons) Equine & Event Management Studies
http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/2017/clareliveseyrb9.jpg

Will you be able to survive now that you have mysteriously shrunk and what will happen to you once you have been picked up by one of the students above.

The girls may decide to keep you as a pet, tease and torture you for fun or they may decide to be nasty and make you part of their diet.

All elements of giantess and related topics are permitted, but I would appreciate toilet and related subjects to be kept to a minimum.

Please add and rate, I do appreciate it.

Thanks

Hannah
x
info.pretty_title: A Pet For A Female University Student
